about_the_game:
Victim Complex is a first person, narrative-driven horror experience. Play as hack medium Jack Lognare, who has stumbled on his first legitimate haunting. Will you try to help the spirits trapped in the haunted apartment complex, or will you rush to save yourself before whatever killed them gets you too?

This game is Part 1 of 3.

The full game target release window is October 2025.

Use Iconic Equipment

Use iconic ghost-hunting equipment to find and communicate with the lingering spirits in an abandoned apartment complex.

Uncover the Mystery

Follow the spirits' clues to discover what happened to the deceased tenants.

Stay Alive

Whatever killed the tenants is still here... can you avoid it and escape with your life?

The Story

Hack medium Jack Lognare has a specialty: "cleansing" haunted locations so that they can be fixed up and sold without the stigma they once had in their communities. When he is hired to exorcise the spirits in an apartment complex in rural Wisconsin, he expects to find the same thing he usually does: nothing.

But when he arrives, he discovers that this time, the rumors may actually be true, and he has found his first legitimate haunting. Initially thrilled to use his phony "ghost hunting equipment" for real, he soon learns that the malicious Entity that supposedly killed all the residents may be real as well... and it doesn't plan on letting him leave so easily.

Each chapter will have multiple endings; will Jack help the trapped spirits along the way and get the true answers, or focus on getting out as quickly as possible before he shares their fate?

You decide how Jack will fare, in Victim Complex.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains strong language, references and audio-only conversations about drug use, (non-sexual) domestic violence, and death. It has an eerie atmosphere and threatening entities that pursue and attack the player.

name: Victim Complex: Part 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Use your wits and iconic ghost hunting equipment to uncover the mystery of what happened to the residents of an abandoned apartment complex in this narrative-driven horror experience.
